#include <stdio.h>
#include <iostream>
#include <string>
#include <string.h>
using namespace std;
int cs[100005];
#define min(a,b) (a<b?a:b)
int main(){

	int T,m ;
	string S;
	
	scanf("%d",&T);

	while(T--){
		cin >> S;
		memset(cs,0,sizeof(int)*S.length());

		for(int i = 0 ; i<S.length() ; i++)
			cs[i] = S[i]=='A';

		for(int i = 1 ; i<S.length() ; i++)
			cs[i] += cs[i-1];

		scanf("%d",&m);

		int ans = m-cs[m-1];
		for(int i = 1 ; i+m-1<S.length() ; i++){
			ans = min(ans,m-(cs[i+m-1]-cs[i-1]));
		}
		printf("%d\n",ans);
	}
	return 0;
}
